attributes.action: Immediate Dissolution of the United Kingdom Government and State
attributes.additional_details: Recognising that the people of England, and the world at large, are functional human beings who do not require the presence of an oppressive and dictatorial state structure to govern their everyday rights, the undersigned request Her Majesty's government to renounce its illegitimate seat of power in the United Kingdom and summarily dissolve itself and allow true liberty to the people of the United Kingdom.
